title: Power of the market
creator_credit: Graham Massey, Michael Latham and Eben Wilson and Rose Friedman
brief_description: First in a ten part series in which economist Milton Friedman expounds his views on various aspects of the market economy. In this film Friedman examines economic freedom as it operates in America and Hong Kong, and the individual freedom that results from it.
